category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_save_all_drawings_in_session
preference.preference_description: Indicates whether commands SAVE/SAVE AS/SAVE SELECTED manage drawings during the save of CATPart or CATProduct. Not case sensitive. Possible values: - Yes: Run the Save command managing Drawings when the active document in CATIA are a CATPart or a CATProduct - No: Run the Save command not managing Drawings when the active document in CATIA are a CATPart or a CATProduct. - Question: Display a prompt when the active document in CATIA are a CATPart or a CATProduct, asking to perform a Save managing Drawings. "Do you want to save Drawings in session?"
